Text: WOW! DID THIS DIRECTLY GO INTO DVD ALREADY? THIS IS SUPPOSED TO B SHOWN IN THEATERS. LOL. TRAILER LOOKS GREAT! THANKS 4 THIS INSANE SCI-FI FLICK. CAN'T WAIT CHECK IT OUT.
so what's the story?

Researchers in Antarctica are abducted by a team of masked storm troopers. They are dragged deep underground to a hidden continent in the center of the earth. Here Nazi survivors, their bodies a horrifying patchwork of decaying and regenerated flesh, are planning for the revival of the Third Reich.

Asylum production, filmed late 2011, looks like someone was inspired by Iron Sky and wanted something with the same theme, but Nazis below earth rather than on the moon. Asylum generally produce knock-offs of "real" movies, with generally poor to laughable results.
